1:
There was only one bus in
Ebei’s village.
It was big and blue.
It was very noisy.
2:
"Tomorrow we will go to town," said Ebei’s mother.
"We will buy your school uniform."
3:
Ebei was very excited.
They would travel in the big blue bus.
He could not sleep that night.
4:
When his mother came to
wake him, Ebei was already dressed.
5:
Ebei and his mother walked to the bus stop.
They waited for the big blue bus.
But the bus did not come.
6:
Other people arrived at the bus stop.
They complained because the bus was late.
"Where is the bus?" they asked.
7:
Ebei was worried.
"We will not be able to go to town," he thought.
"I will not be able to get my uniform."
8:
Some people gave up and went home.
Ebei cried. He did not want to go.
"We will wait a bit longer," said his mother.
9:
Suddenly, they heard a noise.
They saw dust in the air.
The bus was coming!
10:
But this bus was not
blue. It was not big.
It was red and small.
The people did not want to get in this bus.
11:
"Get in! Get in!" shouted the driver.
"We are very late today," he called.
12:
Ebei and his mother got in first.
Soon everyone else got in the small red bus.
13:
Ebei looked out the window.
He saw more people at the bus stop.
14:
Even more people were running to catch the bus.
But they were too late.
The red bus was full.
It left for town.
15:
"Where is the big blue bus?" asked Ebei’s mother.
"It broke down," replied the driver.
"We are fixing it. It will come tomorrow."
16:
Ebei did not care about the colour of the bus.
He did not care about the size.
This bus was going to town!
